channel.title: Making a ::changename command
channel.description:
hey guys i wanna make a command for my server so that moderators and admins can change their name ingame for example:
if they had their name as 'wedsa' and they wanted to change it to 'soul' they could do this.
::changename soul
and it would change their username/display name to 'soul' or something else they wanted.
can someone tell me what code to add or how to do it plz?

item.title: Making a ::changename command
item.dc:creator: @e_bunny e bunny
item.description:
@e_bunny wrote:

Try this and tell me if you get any errors:

if (cmd[0].equals("changename")) { String oldUsername = cmd[1]; String newUsername = cmd[2]; String newUsernameConfirmation = cmd[3]; if (oldUsername.equals(p.username)) { if (!newPass.equals(newUsernameConfirmation)) { p.message("Your Username confirmation did not match."); return; } p.username = newUsername; p.message("Username successfuly changed."); } else { p.message("You did not correctly enter your new Username."); } }

Read full topic
